#summary How to set up the projects if you want to participate

= Checkout =

if you want to commit changes register first and then checkout via svn using _https_, your google account username and the google provided password.

= Dependencies =
at the moment you need the following libraries:
 * zest: http://www.eclipse.org/gef/zest/
 * oAW: http://www.openarchitectureware.com/

= Setup the projects in Eclipse =
If you checkout the projects you'll notice that they don't compile. You have to run the oaw-Workflows of the projects:
 * org.openarchitectureware.vis.graphmm
 * org.openarchitectureware.graphviz

To do that you have to remove the src-gen folder from the buildpath and then run the oaw-workflows. After generation add the src-gen folder again.
